title: Rideshare industry adapting to a changing smallsat market
summary: Firefly Aerospace has acquired Spaceflight, a major rideshare aggregator, to enhance its end-to-end space transportation services. The acquisition includes Spaceflight's payload processing facility and workforce, but Firefly will no longer arrange rides on non-Firefly launch vehicles. The financial details of the deal were not disclosed.
why_it_matters: The acquisition removes a key player from the rideshare market, potentially reshaping the industry's dynamics. It also highlights the growing trend of vertical integration in space transportation services, as companies seek to offer comprehensive solutions from launch to orbit.
